amendment.description: Amendment requires chairmen of committees to obtain either the agreement of the ranking minority member or the approval of a majority of committee members before waiving the seven-day prior notice requirement for conducting hearings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the chairmen of committees to obtain either the agreement of the ranking minority member or the approval of a majority of committee members before waiving the seven-day prior notice requirement for conducting hearings.
